Room.Name: Wall Road West
Room.ShortDescription: Wall Road West continues to the north and south.
Room.LongDescription: One of the richest families in the village is that of squire Frebineb, a very old name in hobbitry society. The squire's family has lived here since the village was founded, and his ancesters helped drive off the mountian trolls when they attacked centuries ago. Since that time there have been minor skirmishes, and the squire's relatives have always been the first to volunteer for the dangerous jobs. His mansion is east of the road.
